modName: Woldo of The General Lee sam -Korean
summary: Chosun Dynasty’s General Lee sam’s Woldo
descriptionHtml:
The King Mu-Ryeong\'s Sword link : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4966

Some people wanted 1handed version. so I modified this file. and Uploaded.

1. What is this?

 
This mod adds an new, craftable exotic oriental moonblade. In terms of shape, it looks like an guisarme or glaive or something. Koreans call these kind of weaponry as \"Un_wall_do\", which means \"A blade looks like an cresent moon with the spear shaft\". (FYI, guisarme is an pole weapon used in Europe primarily between 1000-1400. like many medieval polearms, the exact form of the weapon is hard to define from literary references and the identification of surviving weapons can be speculative.)


2. History about the Moonblade

This Weapon has it’s own history, actually.
The Owner\'s name is \"Lee sam\" who was the General of The Chosun Dynasty, Famous for outstanding Swordmanship skills, incorruptible personality and noble loyalty to the King. This weapons is one of his legacy that remains.
At the body of the blade, there\'s a carved phrase \"Yong_Gwang_Sa Woo_Du_Sung\" which means \"lighting the emperor\'s willingness, By Being the sword arm of the one\".


3. Specifications

In the real mesur,, It weighs 2.9kg and length 191.5cm.
In the game, It is a 2H weapon. and hammer type.
You may Forge and enhance the weapon at the Deadric smithing section.


4. Installation

Extract the 7z file to the Data folder in the Skyrim Installation directory.


5. Further plans

I’m planning to create some more korean weapons. Currently i’m working on

· Baek_Jae Dynasty\'s Hwan_Du_Dae_Do

· The Sword of the progenitor of the Chosun dynasty, Tae_Jo_Eer_Do


 Enjoy.
author: Lee and Yoon
